snippet: In the government’s corruption case against a former councilwoman, a Judge Colleen McMahon suggested that proof of a conspiracy may be lacking.
abstract: Federal Judge Colleen McMahon indicates she is troubled by lack of evidence of criminal conspiracy in government’s corruption case against Sandy Annabi, former Yonkers councilwoman; Annabi is accused of selling her vote to approve a proposed luxury mall and housing complex in return for $175,000 in secret payments.
lead_paragraph: In the government’s corruption case against a former councilwoman, a Judge Colleen McMahon suggested that proof of a conspiracy may be lacking.

headline.seo: Judge in Yonkers Corruption Case Raises Doubts on Evidence
headline.main: Judge in Case From Yonkers Raises Doubts on Evidence
headline.print_headline: Judge in Case From Yonkers Questions Conspiracy
